channel.title: Hitsplat Glide [INFO]
channel.description: So, im not expecting anyone to really tell me because I don't think anyone knows really =\. But yeah can anyone give me some info on the Hitsplat glide.. For example how when you hit someone the amount you hit show's and then it starts gliding up and disappears. If there is something released on this please link me to it if you can ^_^.

item.title: Hitsplat Glide [INFO]
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

So, im not expecting anyone to really tell me because I don’t think anyone knows really =. But yeah can anyone give me some info on the Hitsplat glide… For example how when you hit someone the amount you hit show’s and then it starts gliding up and disappears. If there is something released on this please link me to it if you can ^_^.
